H0.text: What is the name of Terence and Shirley Conran's dress designer son. Sebastian

H1.text: What is the name of Terence and Shirley Conran's dress designer son. Jasper

H2.text: What is the name of Terence and Shirley Conran's dress designer son. Felix

H3.text: What is the name of Terence and Shirley Conran's dress designer son. Jaspis

A4.text: Conran married his second wife, journalist Shirley Pearce, in 1955 with whom he had two sons – Sebastian and Jasper – before they divorced in 1962.

A5.text: Jasper Alexander Thirlby Conran is the second son of Sir Terence Conran and Shirley Pearce
